claim: Flublok contains 45 micrograms (mcg) of HA per strain vs 15 mcg of HA per strain in a standard-dose influenza vaccine.
explanation: A table listing various influenza vaccines by trade name, presentations, age indications, amount of hemagglutinin (HA) per vaccine virus per dose (µg HA/0.5 mL), route, and thimerosal content. Evidence: Under RIV4 (recombinant HA vaccine), Flublok Quadrivalent is shown as 45 µg/0.5 mL per strain; under IIV4 (standard-dose, egg-based vaccines), multiple vaccines list 15 µg/0.5 mL per strain. The table supports the claim by directly showing that Flublok contains 45 µg HA per strain compared with 15 µg HA per strain in standard-dose influenza vaccines.
